com.ideopoly.game

Class BoardCell

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.ideopoly.game.BoardCell
  • Direct Known Subclasses:
    ChanceOrCommChestCell, PropagandaOutlet, Railroad, SpecialCell, UtilityCell

    public abstract class BoardCell
extends java.lang.Object
    A BoardCell represents any of the cells running along the outside edge of the game board. Since there are different types of cells running along the outside of the board, we use inheritance to create classes derived from BoardCells.
    Author:
    Daniel Neel

      Creates a BoardCell object, with the specified name, image path, coordinates, and player standing positions.

    • Constructor Detail

      • BoardCell

        public BoardCell(java.lang.String newName,
         java.lang.String imagePath,
         int xPos,
         int yPos,
         IdeopolyGUI g)
        Creates a BoardCell object, with the specified name, image path, coordinates, and player standing positions. Does not have an owner. There are no players standing on this object.

      • getPosition

        public BoardPosition getPosition(int p)
        Returns the BoardPosition associated with Player p. For example, if p is 2, we return player 2's BoardPosition.
